meanings.definition: To shut off or keep apart, as from company, society, etc.
meanings.sent1: The hermit secludes himself in the mountains away from others.
meanings.sent2: She secludes herself in her room when she needs some quiet time.
meanings.sent3: The cat secludes itself under the bed whenever visitors come over.
meanings.sent4: The treasure map secludes the location of the hidden chest deep in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The thick fog secludes the small village from the rest of the world.
